insert into T_ZA_NB_DWJC_ZP (ZPID, YHDD, YHDDZP,AQJCID,JGBH,DWLB,DJSJ) values (?, ?, ?, ?,?,?,sysdate)
select zpid , yhdd, aqjcid from T_ZA_NB_DWJC_ZP where aqjcid=? and yhdd=?
update t_za_jg_jbxx set sfnbgl='0' where sfnbgl='1' and jgbh= ?
update t_za_dwhc set nbhc='0',dwfl='',zddwbz='' where nbhc='1' and jgbh= ?
